nodes.excerpt: Your own version of The Bachelor(ette). Every week, we'll feature bachelor(ette)s you can pitch a date to. We'll live stream some of the finalists. Even if you're not interested in dating one of our bachelor(ette)s, you can matchmake them for prizes.
nodes.title: Pitch a Date - Pitch a date to one of our bachelor(ette)s.
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 你自己版本的单身汉(ette)。每周，我们都会推出你可以投递约会对象的单身汉。我们会直播一些决赛选手。即使你没有兴趣和我们的单身汉约会，你也可以和他们做媒来获得奖品。
localize.tagline: 向我们的单身汉们推荐一个约会。

localize.description: 你自己版本的單身漢(ette)。每週，我們都會推出你可以投遞約會對象的單身漢。我們會直播一些決賽選手。即使你沒有興趣和我們的單身漢約會，你也可以和他們做媒來獲得獎品。
localize.tagline: 向我們的單身漢們推薦一個約會。

nodes.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth
nodes.title: From Data-Driven to Data Everywhere - How to drive growth with user-facing analytics
nodes.author: Charles Miglietti

localize.description: 认为你的公司是数据驱动的？可能吧。但你如何确保你的数据为客户创造真正的价值？在这本电子书中，您将学习如何使用您的数据。赋予你的客户权力 🏆 改善你的产品供应 📈 推动持久的增长。
localize.tagline: 如何通过面向用户的分析来推动增长？

localize.description: 認爲你的公司是數據驅動的？可能吧。但你如何確保你的數據爲客戶創造真正的價值？在這本電子書中，您將學習如何使用您的數據。賦予你的客戶權力 🏆 改善你的產品供應 📈 推動持久的增長。
localize.tagline: 如何通過面向用戶的分析來推動增長？

nodes.excerpt: Grow your business overnight, every night. Tech startups and newsletter publishers enjoy low-cost growth with our referral program software. - GrowSurf customers see 300-1000% returns and 9-40% monthly growth.
nodes.title: GrowSurf - Build a referral program into your product or newsletter
nodes.author: Kevin Yun

localize.description: 一夜之间，每晚都能增长你的业务。科技创业公司和通讯出版商通过我们的推荐计划软件享受低成本增长。- GrowSurf的客户看到300-1000%的回报和9-40%的月增长。
localize.tagline: 在您的产品或时事通讯中建立一个推荐计划。

localize.description: 一夜之間，每晚都能增長你的業務。科技創業公司和通訊出版商通過我們的推薦計劃軟件享受低成本增長。- GrowSurf的客戶看到300-1000%的回報和9-40%的月增長。
localize.tagline: 在您的產品或時事通訊中建立一個推薦計劃。

nodes.excerpt: Applysis is a data analytics tool, helping businesses owning mobile applications to analyse customer reviews efficiently, in a matter of minutes. With the help of AI we detect concrete problems and most requested features.
nodes.title: Applysis - Analyse mobile app reviews efficiently, in minutes.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Applysis是一款数据分析工具，帮助拥有移动应用的企业在几分钟内高效分析客户评价。在人工智能的帮助下，我们会发现具体的问题和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内高效分析移动应用的评论。

localize.description: Applysis是一款數據分析工具，幫助擁有移動應用的企業在幾分鐘內高效分析客戶評價。在人工智能的幫助下，我們會發現具體的問題和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內高效分析移動應用的評論。

nodes.excerpt: Lucky Carrot is an All-in-One Employee Engagement Platform: ⠀ ◾ enables the employees to recognize each other, ◾ brings visibility to employees’ achievements, ◾ makes the employees’ voice heard through surveys, ◾ gives insights to enhance employee engagement.
nodes.title: Lucky Carrot - Make your employees super engaged, recognized, & appreciated
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 幸运萝卜是一个全方位的员工参与平台。⠀◾让员工互相认可，◾为员工的成就带来可见性，◾通过调查让员工的声音被听到，◾提供洞察力，提高员工的参与度。
localize.tagline: 让你的员工超强的参与度、认可度和感激度。

localize.description: 幸運蘿蔔是一個全方位的員工參與平臺。⠀◾讓員工互相認可，◾爲員工的成就帶來可見性，◾通過調查讓員工的聲音被聽到，◾提供洞察力，提高員工的參與度。
localize.tagline: 讓你的員工超強的參與度、認可度和感激度。

nodes.excerpt: Join us for a weekly fireside chat with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta: former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, Previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
nodes.title: UserLeap: The Biggest Launch - Learn what makes or breaks a successful product launch

localize.description: 加入我们，每周与标志性的产品领袖进行炉边聊天。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地图产品负责人 2月11日：张佳娜，Webflow产品副总裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就职于Snap、Twitter和Facebook。

nodes.excerpt: Most businesses don't have enough time or resources to capture the Customer Success Stories that build trust and authority. Our chatbots automatically ask your customers the right questions to generate engaging stories and compelling social proof.

nodes.author: Simon Neve

nodes.excerpt: Bitwit has the vision of making Bitcoin a commonly accepted currency. We enable Bitcoin holders to see where they can spent their money. Bitwit also helps people understand what their daily purchases cost in Bitcoin using the Bitcoin Daily feature.
nodes.title: Bitwit - Find companies that accept bitcoin as payment
nodes.author: Mehdi

localize.description: Bitwit的愿景是让比特币成为一种普遍接受的货币。我们让比特币的持有者能够看到他们的钱可以花在哪里。Bitwit还通过Bitcoin Daily功能帮助人们了解他们每天购买比特币的成本。
localize.tagline: 寻找接受比特币支付的公司

localize.description: Bitwit的願景是讓比特幣成爲一種普遍接受的貨幣。我們讓比特幣的持有者能夠看到他們的錢可以花在哪裏。Bitwit還通過Bitcoin Daily功能幫助人們瞭解他們每天購買比特幣的成本。
localize.tagline: 尋找接受比特幣支付的公司

nodes.excerpt: MyEdu is an edu-tech firm that provides communication software solutions and apps for assisting school teachers, parents, as well as students. MyEdu's apps also help teachers in managing day-to-day activities in the most efficient way possible.

nodes.excerpt: Alice is an AI camera that works with your smartphone to shoot and share better content in a fraction of the time. Capture crystal clear 4K footage straight out of camera — and share it instantly to your followers.

localize.description: 爱丽丝是一款人工智能相机，它可以与智能手机配合使用，在极短的时间内拍摄并分享更好的内容。直接从相机中捕捉晶莹剔透的4K画面--并即时分享给您的追随者。
localize.tagline: 为内容创作者打造的AI相机

nodes.excerpt: At BAM, we created a set of most-used icons in 3D. Now we'd like to put our illustrations into your dispositions, you can use them for any use, our only condition is that you can't resell them as your creation and you keep our name in your credit :) Enjoy!
nodes.title: BAM Free 3D Illustration Kit - More than 30 high quality 3D icons, free to use.
nodes.author: Xindi Yang

localize.description: 在BAM，我们创建了一套3D中最常用的图标。现在，我们想把我们的插图放到您的手中，您可以将它们用于任何用途，我们唯一的条件是您不能将它们作为您的作品转售，并且您要将我们的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多个高质量的3D图标，免费使用。

localize.description: 在BAM，我們創建了一套3D中最常用的圖標。現在，我們想把我們的插圖放到您的手中，您可以將它們用於任何用途，我們唯一的條件是您不能將它們作爲您的作品轉售，並且您要將我們的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多個高質量的3D圖標，免費使用。

nodes.excerpt: Browser Stealth Mode is a chrome extension that lets you browse and watch anything without worrying about who's looking over your shoulder. You can toggle stealth mode in your current tab. Stealth mode includes grayscale, hiding images/videos, and muting tab.
nodes.title: Browser Stealth Mode - Disguise your internet browsing activities
nodes.author: Nivi Jayasekar

localize.description: 浏览器隐身模式是一个chrome扩展，让你浏览和观看任何东西，而不用担心谁在看你的肩膀。你可以在当前标签中切换隐身模式。隐身模式包括灰度、隐藏图片/视频和静音标签。
localize.tagline: 掩饰您的互联网浏览活动

localize.description: 瀏覽器隱身模式是一個chrome擴展，讓你瀏覽和觀看任何東西，而不用擔心誰在看你的肩膀。你可以在當前標籤中切換隱身模式。隱身模式包括灰度、隱藏圖片/視頻和靜音標籤。
localize.tagline: 掩飾您的互聯網瀏覽活動

nodes.excerpt: Based on Codeforces, Game of Codes is all about competitive programming, be it practicing, analyzing, learning, or even doing contests with your friends! This is full in one package for Codeforces lovers, and have 2000+ users registered and growing.
nodes.title: Game Of Codes - Level up your code
nodes.author: Abhinandan Sharma

localize.description: 基于Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款关于竞技编程的游戏，无论是练习、分析、学习，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比赛都是如此! 这是为Codeforces爱好者提供的全套服务，目前已有2000+用户注册，并在不断增长。
localize.tagline: 提升您的代码水平

localize.description: 基於Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款關於競技編程的遊戲，無論是練習、分析、學習，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比賽都是如此! 這是爲Codeforces愛好者提供的全套服務，目前已有2000+用戶註冊，並在不斷增長。
localize.tagline: 提升您的代碼水平

nodes.excerpt: Quicksize gives you your exact size in the brand and model of your choice based on what you already have in your closet. Coming on Apple and Android soon!
nodes.title: Quicksize - Never order the wrong size again

nodes.excerpt: A place for your links and notes Keep all of your links and notes in one place, and easily share them with your Clubhouse community. Free your links from limitations of text Save time and effort by shortening links to the right length with one click.

nodes.excerpt: Watch Something helps you find great movies or TV shows to watch on Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Prime. But instead of recommending 1000 mediocre options, Watch Something provides 3 great, highly rated options (you can load more), based on the user preferred genre.
nodes.title: Watch Something - Discover what to watch on Netflix, Amazon and Hulu
nodes.author: Gal Vered

localize.description: Watch Something 帮助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上观看的优秀电影或电视节目。但是，Watch Something不是推荐1000个平庸的选项，而是根据用户喜欢的类型，提供3个伟大的、高评价的选项（你可以加载更多）。
localize.tagline: 发现在Netflix、亚马逊和Hulu上看什么？

localize.description: Watch Something 幫助您找到可在 Netflix、Hulu 或 Amazon Prime 上觀看的優秀電影或電視節目。但是，Watch Something不是推薦1000個平庸的選項，而是根據用戶喜歡的類型，提供3個偉大的、高評價的選項（你可以加載更多）。
localize.tagline: 發現在Netflix、亞馬遜和Hulu上看什麼？
